button.detail.description: Button text to view the details of the website's referral history.

button.withdrawal.description: Button text to withdraw the referral earnings from the website.

button.query.description: Button text to query the referral earnings on the website.

field.id.description: A unique identifier for the referral, referring to the API service website's referral.

field.percentage.description: The percentage of referral earnings calculated based on the order amount.

field.price.description: The order amount used to calculate referral earnings.

field.reward.description: Referral earnings calculated based on the order amount and referral earnings percentage.

field.userId.description: A unique identifier for the user, referring to the API service website's user.

field.createdAt.description: The time when the referral was created.

field.level.description: The level of the referral used to calculate referral earnings.

field.threshold.description: The threshold for referral earnings used for withdrawing referral earnings.

field.inviteeId.description: A unique identifier for the inviter, referring to the person who invited the invitee to the API service website.

field.isVerified.description: Flag indicating whether the referred user has been verified with real information.

message.deltaPriceForNextLevel.description: The difference between the current order amount and the threshold for the next level.

message.developingWithDrawal.message: Please contact customer service to process the withdrawal; relevant income taxes will be deducted from the withdrawal.
message.developingWithDrawal.description: Message indicating that the withdrawal feature is under development.

message.technicalDetail.description: Technical implementation details of the referral system.

message.distributionQrDescription.message: Referral QR Code (same as link content)
message.distributionQrDescription.description: Description for the referral QR code.

message.distributionLink.description: Referral link used to bind customers as downline customers.

message.updateSuccessfully.description: Message indicating that the referral information has been successfully updated.

message.distributionLinkDescription.message: If a customer registers on this platform via this link or QR code, the customer will be permanently bound as your downline customer, and all spending orders of the customer on this platform will return to your account based on the current distribution percentage.

message.distributionLinkDescription2.message: This link contains your user ID. When the customer opens the link, your user ID will be recorded in the customer's browser as a cookie, valid for seven days. Within seven days, if the customer registers on this platform by scanning the code, your user ID will be uploaded to the registration server along with the cookie, binding the customer as your downline customer.

title.price.description: Total amount of referral orders used to calculate referral earnings.

title.reward.description: Total referral rewards calculated based on order amount and referral earnings percentage.

title.level.description: Referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.percentage.description: Percentage of referral earnings used to calculate referral earnings.

title.currentLevel.description: Current referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.nextLevel.description: Next referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.currentPercentage.description: Current referral earnings percentage used to calculate referral earnings.

title.nextPercentage.description: The referral earnings percentage for the next level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.levelInfo.description: Information about the referral level used to calculate referral earnings.

title.distributionLink.description: Referral link used to bind customers as downline customers.

title.inviteesCount.description: The total number of invitees, used for calculating referral income.
